basics.name: Kiran Datwani
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

work.company: Associated Students of the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa
work.position: Senator of the Colleges of Arts and Sciences
work.summary: Representative for the UH Manoa undergraduate student body
highlights: Member of Campus Life and Undergraduate Academic Affairs committees
Represented ASUH at the ACUI Region I and IV in Reno, Nevada
Interviewed and selected program heads for the 4 student-run media programs on campus

work.summary: Organized, Prepared and Served Dishes at UH Manoa events
highlights: Served at special, food-related events on the university campus
Events included Taste of Manoa, RIOs’, clubs’ and organizations’ banquets, and VIP events
Assisted parents at their clothing store throughout high school, and during 	summer breaks and the Christmas season during undergraduate studies
Designed and created fliers, videos, banners, logo, and other forms of media to promote the store, discounts and sales
Provides service to customers, arranged and organized clothing
During school semester, interned as a practicum experience, and during the summer, as a part-time job and internship
Wrote articles and stories that were published in the newspapers every week

volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Organized and planed exhibitions in the community that took place twice a year
Exhibited paintings, and occasionally took part in competitions, including in 	fields such as photography, dance, and poetry, which were hosted by Jambo Arts

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
